verses.verse: The word <WH1697> which <WH834> came <WH1961> to Jeremiah <WH3414> from the Lord, <WH3068> saying, <WH559>
"Hear <WH8085> the words <WH1697> of this <WH384> covenant, <WH1285> and speak <WH1696> to the men <WH376> of Judah <WH3063> and to the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem; <WH3389>

and say <WH559> to them, 'Thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> "Cursed <WH779> is the man <WH376> who <WH834> does not heed <WH8085> the words <WH1697> of this <WH384> covenant <WH1285>

which <WH834> I commanded <WH6680> your forefathers in the day <WH1> that I brought <WH3117> them out of the land <WH3318> of Egypt, <WH776> from the iron <WH4714> furnace, <WH1270> saying, <WH3564> 'Listen <WH559> to My voice, <WH8085> and do <WH6963> according to all <WH6213> which <WH3605> I command <WH834> you; so you shall be My people, <WH6680> and I will be your God, <WH5971>'

in order <WH4616> to confirm <WH6965> the oath <WH7621> which <WH834> I swore <WH7650> to your forefathers, to give <WH1> them a land <WH5414> flowing <WH776> with milk <WH2100> and honey, <WH2461> as [it is] this <WH1706> day. <WH2088> "'"Then I answered <WH3117> and said, <WH6030> "Amen, <WH559> O Lord. <WH543>"

And the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> to me, "Proclaim <WH7121> all <WH3605> these <WH428> words <WH1697> in the cities <WH5892> of Judah <WH3063> and in the streets <WH2351> of Jerusalem, <WH3389> saying, <WH559> 'Hear <WH8085> the words <WH1697> of this <WH384> covenant <WH1285> and do <WH6213> them.

'For I solemnly <WH5749> warned <WH5749> your fathers in the day <WH1> that I brought <WH3117> them up from the land <WH5927> of Egypt, <WH776> even to this <WH4714> day, <WH2088> warning <WH3117> persistently, <WH5749> saying, <WH7925> "Listen <WH559> to My voice. <WH8085>"

'Yet they did not obey <WH8085> or incline <WH5186> their ear, <WH241> but walked, <WH1980> each <WH376> one, <WH376> in the stubbornness <WH8307> of his evil <WH7451> heart; <WH3820> therefore I brought <WH935> on them all <WH3605> the words <WH1697> of this <WH384> covenant, <WH1285> which <WH834> I commanded <WH6680> [them] to do, <WH6213> but they did <WH6213> not.' "
Then the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> to me, "A conspiracy <WH7195> has been found <WH4672> among the men <WH376> of Judah <WH3063> and among the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem. <WH3389>

"They have turned <WH7725> back <WH7725> to the iniquities <WH5771> of their ancestors <WH7223> who <WH834> refused <WH3985> to hear <WH8085> My words, <WH1697> and they have gone <WH1980> after <WH310> other <WH312> gods <WH430> to serve <WH5647> them; the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> and the house <WH1004> of Judah <WH3063> have broken <WH6565> My covenant <WH1285> which <WH834> I made <WH3772> with their fathers."

Therefore <WH3651> thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord, <WH3068> "Behold <WH2009> I am bringing <WH935> disaster <WH9567> on them which <WH834> they will not be able <WH3201> to escape; <WH3318> though they will cry <WH2199> to Me, yet I will not listen <WH8085> to them.

"Then the cities <WH5892> of Judah <WH3063> and the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem <WH3389> will go <WH1980> and cry <WH2199> to the gods <WH430> to whom <WH834> they burn <WH6999> incense, <WH6999> but they surely <WH3467> will not save <WH3467> them in the time <WH6256> of their disaster. <WH9567>

"For your gods <WH430> are as many <WH4557> as your cities, <WH5892> O Judah; <WH3063> and as many <WH4557> as the streets <WH2351> of Jerusalem <WH3389> are the altars <WH4196> you have set <WH7760> up to the shameful <WH1322> thing, <WH1322> altars <WH4196> to burn <WH6999> incense <WH6999> to Baal. <WH1168>

"Therefore do not pray <WH6419> for this <WH384> people, <WH5971> nor <WH408> lift <WH5375> up a cry <WH7440> or prayer <WH8605> for them; for I will not listen <WH8085> when <WH6256> they call <WH7121> to Me because <WH1157> of their disaster. <WH9567>

"What <WH4100> right has My beloved <WH3039> in My house <WH1004> When <WH3588> she has done <WH6213> many <WH7227> vile <WH4209> deeds <WH4209>? Can the sacrificial <WH6944> flesh <WH1320> take <WH5674> away <WH5674> from you your disaster, <WH9567> So <WH227> [that] you can rejoice <WH5937>?"

The Lord <WH3068> called <WH7121> your name, <WH8034> "A green <WH7488> olive <WH2132> tree, <WH2132> beautiful <WH3303> in fruit <WH6529> and form <WH8389>"; With the noise <WH6963> of a great <WH1419> tumult <WH1999> He has kindled <WH3341> fire <WH784> on it, And its branches <WH1808> are worthless. <WH9570>

And the Lord <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> who planted <WH5193> you, has pronounced <WH1696> evil <WH9567> against <WH5921> you because <WH1558> of the evil <WH9567> of the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> and of the house <WH1004> of Judah, <WH3063> which <WH834> they have done <WH6213> to provoke <WH3707> Me by offering <WH6999> up sacrifices <WH6999> to Baal. <WH1168>
Moreover, the Lord <WH3068> made <WH3045> it known <WH3045> to me and I knew <WH3045> it; Then <WH227> Thou didst show <WH7200> me their deeds. <WH4611>

But I was like a gentle <WH9017> lamb <WH3532> led <WH2986> to the slaughter; <WH2873> And I did not know <WH3045> that they had devised <WH2803> plots <WH4284> against <WH5921> me, [saying,] "Let us destroy <WH7843> the tree <WH6086> with its fruit, <WH3899> And let us cut <WH3772> him off <WH3772> from the land <WH776> of the living, <WH2416> That his name <WH8034> be remembered <WH2142> no <WH3808> more. <WH5750>"

But, O Lord <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> who judges <WH8199> righteously, <WH6664> Who tries <WH974> the feelings <WH3629> and the heart, <WH3820> Let me see <WH7200> Thy vengeance <WH5360> on them, For to Thee have I committed <WH1540> my cause. <WH7379>

Therefore <WH3651> thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> concerning <WH5921> the men <WH376> of Anathoth, <WH6068> who seek <WH1245> your life, <WH5315> saying, <WH559> "Do not prophesy <WH5012> in the name <WH8034> of the Lord, <WH3068> that you might not die <WH4191> at our hand <WH3027>";

therefore, <WH3651> thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> "Behold, <WH2009> I am about to punish <WH6485> them! The young <WH970> men <WH970> will die <WH4191> by the sword, <WH2719> their sons <WH1121> and daughters <WH1323> will die <WH4191> by famine; <WH7458>
and a remnant <WH7611> will not be left <WH1961> to them, for I will bring <WH935> disaster <WH9567> on the men <WH376> of Anathoth <WH6068> â€“ the year <WH8141> of their punishment. <WH6486> "
